description:
"We, the athletes, swear not to forget to thank our fans and live up to their expectations as we fight fair and square to the best of our ability. Athlete representative, Ohara Sora."
The entertainers of Tsukino Entertainment Productions have gathered for the red versus white TSUKIPRO Sports Tournament. Team red is Six Gravity, SolidS, and SOARA.
Team white is Procellarum, QUELL, and Growth. As the official supporters of the tournament, the super amped members of SOARA are tasked with reporting on the event!
The tournament is about to begin!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: スタートライン ~Boys, Be Mighty~
